item.description:
NEWER STUFF:
I meant Friday, not Saturday. (Thanks, Meagan!)

NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 6:20 on Saturday, so let's meet BY 5:45 in front of the theater. If it sells out, there is a 7:00 show as well (which is why I'm going for the earlier one). I will be buying the tickets at 6:00 SHARP, so if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP at the last minute, please let me know with a phone call -- 508/308/4897.

Hope to see you Friday!

--Dana

OLD STUFF:
Angels and Demons can't be bad if it's anything like The DaVinci Code. Besides -- HELLO! -- Tom Hanks. Brilliant actor much?

Summary:
When Robert Langdon discovers evidence of the resurgence of an ancient secret brotherhood known as the Illuminati -- the most powerful underground organization in history -- he also faces a deadly threat to the existence of the secret organization's most despised enemy: the Catholic Church. When Langdon learns that the clock is ticking on an unstoppable Illuminati time bomb, he jets to Rome, where he joins forces with Vittoria Vetra, a beautiful and enigmatic Italian scientist. Embarking on a nonstop hunt through sealed crypts, dangerous catacombs, deserted cathedrals and even to the heart of the most secretive vault on earth, Langdon and Vetra will follow a 400-year-old trail of ancient symbols that mark the Vatican's only hope for survival.

The usual stuff:
We'll meet inside the theater doors (or outside if it's nice out) and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.50 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the exact time of the meeting about 2 days before the meetup.

Hope to see you for Angels and Demons!

--Dana
item.name: Angels and Demons
